QuestData.Title: Arkethrax
QuestData.Description: Within the Ingress is a demon who must die.$b$bArkethrax is a creature of cunning evil. If left unchecked he will be able to use the Ingress as a staging point for targeted assaults that will decimate our forces.$b$bI, for one, have no intention of underestimating this opponent and shall join you on the battlefield when you are ready to fight him.
QuestData.RewardText: With Arkethrax and his minions dealt with it should help prevent them from flanking Illidari Stand. Well done.
